attributes.action: Revive the tradition of having a cat on the payroll in Government offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In times past, Government offices in Whitehall had cats on the payroll. Their duties were to catch mice and rats in the office. If every Government Department was encouraged to keep a cat on the payroll today, it would keep down the mice and the presence of a cat would be a calming influence on the staff in the hurly burly of office life.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
